articles.content: Earnhardt drove from 12th place to the lead in Miami, and only lost a certain runner-up finish due to a late-race caution period. Since his retirement from full-time competition in 2017, he has run o… [+1104 chars]

articles.title: Roger Goodell saying Black Lives Matter is 'almost like a slap in the face,' Michael Bennett says - CNN
articles.description: NFL defensive end Michael Bennett isn't buying Commissioner Roger Goodell's comments last week that the league believes Black Lives Matter.
articles.content:

articles.title: Neighbor, 60, stabbed by Kareem Abdul-Jabbar's son says they argued over trash cans before attack - Daily Mail
